welcomeMessage: Hello! How can I help you today?
genericApiError: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.
lockoutMessage: Too many failed attempts. Please try again in {{minutes}} minutes and {{seconds}} seconds.
resetPasswordSuccess: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
resetPasswordInstructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
copyright: Copyright © {{year}}. All rights reserved. Developed by DTS Cloud Solutions.
dashboardWelcomeMessage: Here's a quick overview of your application's status.
selectSection: Please select a section from the navigation menu.
userSearchPlaceholder: Search by name, username, or email...
deleteUserConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the user {{user}}? This action cannot be undone.
passwordPlaceholderOptional: Leave blank to keep current password
permDesc.canViewDashboard: Allows user to access the admin dashboard.
permDesc.canManageUsers: Allows creating, editing, and deleting users.
permDesc.canManageRoles: Allows editing permissions for other roles.
permDesc.canManageKB: Allows adding, editing, and deleting knowledge base entries.
permDesc.canViewModelConfig: Allows viewing the AI model's configuration.
permDesc.canEditModelConfig: Allows changing the AI model's parameters and API key.
permDesc.canViewCompanySettings: Allows viewing company branding and information.
permDesc.canEditCompanySettings: Allows changing company branding and information.
permDesc.canViewChatLogs: Allows viewing conversation histories of all users.
permDesc.canViewSmtpSettings: Allows viewing SMTP server settings for emails.
permDesc.canEditSmtpSettings: Allows changing SMTP settings and email templates.
permDesc.canCustomizePanel: Allows customizing the chat panel's appearance and text.
permDesc.canManageBackups: Allows creating and restoring system backups.
permDesc.canImportUsers: Allows bulk importing of users via a CSV file.
fixedPermissionsInfo: The Admin and Manager roles have all permissions enabled by default and cannot be modified.
deleteEntryConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the entry with the tag '{{tag}}'?
formRequiredError: Please fill out all required fields.
kbSaveError: Failed to save the entry. Please try again.
unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. What would you like to do?
kbAutoSaveError: Auto-save failed. Please check your connection.
kbUploadErrorInvalid: Invalid file type. Please upload a .txt or .md file.
apiKeyAdminConfigured: The key is managed by an administrator.
apiKeyDescription: Your API key is stored securely and is only used to communicate with the provider's API.
apiKeyConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to update the API key? This may affect the application's functionality.
customInstructionDescription: Provide specific rules or context for the AI to follow in every response.
temperatureDescription: Controls randomness. Lower values are more deterministic.
topPDescription: Nucleus sampling. Considers tokens with a certain probability mass.
topKDescription: Considers the top K most likely tokens at each step.
logoRecommendations: Recommended: SVG, PNG, or JPG. Max height: 80px.
passwordLengthError: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
passkeyDescription: Register a passkey (using face, fingerprint, or security key) for a faster and more secure sign-in experience.
passkeyError: An error occurred with the passkey operation: {{message}}
passkeyUsernamePrompt: Please enter your username to continue with your passkey.
passkeyLoginFailed: Passkey authentication failed. Please check your username or try another method.
chatLogsSearchPlaceholder: Search by user or message content...
welcomeMessageDescription: The first message the AI sends to a user.
smtpSettingsDescription: Configure your SMTP server for sending transactional emails.
subject: Subject
backupExportDescription: Download a JSON file containing specific parts of your application data.
exportDataDesc: Download a single file containing all application data.
backupRestoreWarning: Restoring from a backup will overwrite existing data. This action is irreversible. Proceed with caution.
backupInvalidFile: Invalid file. Please select a .json backup file.
backupRestoreConfirmMessage: Are you absolutely sure you want to restore from this backup? All matching data will be overwritten.
backupRestoreSuccess: Restore successful. The application will now reload.
mobileVerificationPrompt: For security purposes, please provide your mobile number to continue.
importUsersDesc: Import users from a CSV file. The file must contain the following columns in order: username, password, firstName, lastName, email, mobile, role.
importCsvEmpty: The CSV file is empty or contains only a header.
importConfirmMessage: You are about to create {{new}} new users and update {{update}} existing users. Are you sure you want to proceed?
usernameInvalidFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and . _ -
notConnected: Not connected to any cloud storage.
googleDriveRequiredForAutoBackup: A Google Drive connection is required to enable automatic backups.
backupTypePanelDesc: Customizations like AI name, avatar, and welcome messages.
backupTypeModelDesc: AI model settings, temperature, and custom instructions.
backupTypeKBDesc: All entries from the knowledge base.
backupTypeDBDesc: All user accounts and conversation history.
openRouterCustomModelsDesc: Add models from OpenRouter that are not in the default list. You need the model's ID from the OpenRouter documentation.
customModelDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the custom model '{{name}}'?
customModelExistsError: A custom model with this ID already exists.
sampleQ2: How can I reset my password?
sampleQ3: Tell me about your refund policy.
sampleQ4: How do I contact a human agent?
